DataElement.preferredName: Stroke Symptom Greater Than Day Outcome Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether the result of the stroke symptoms lasted greater than a day.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Stroke Symptom Greater Than Day Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A sudden loss of neurological function secondary to hemorrhage or ischemia in the brain parenchyma due to a vascular event.:Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
